name: omnipotently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is omnipotent (= having unlimited power and able to do anything): Christians believe that God omnipotently created Man from the elements of the earth. In this video game, you play the role of an emperor who can omnipotently control his lands and people.
More examplesFewer examplesHe omnipotently asserted his control over the organization, demanding total obedience from his staff.She struggled with the idea that God, being omnipotently good, could allow such evil to exist.
